Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that Ivanka Trump will move into the White House because Melania Trump is not immediately planning to do so. The article falsely claims that Ivanka will be taking Melania's place at any point, which is not true.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that Ivanka Trump will move into the White House. The information provided in the article is fabricated and not based on factual information.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Ivanka Trump will fill Melania's vacancy in the White House, which is a problematic assumption as there is no evidence or official statement to support this claim.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that Melania Trump may have her own reasons for not immediately moving into the White House, which are not mentioned or explored in the claim. The claim only focuses on Ivanka Trump as a replacement without considering other possibilities.
